content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. a) Identify ONE economic development that would support Biran’s argument in the passage regarding the Mongols and the “integration of the old world.” b) Explain how ONE piece of evidence would challenge Biran’s argument regarding the Mongols and “the first chapter of a new era.” c) Explain how ONE intercultural transfer or exchange resulted from the Mongol conquests.

frqParts.text: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. a) Identify ONE economic development that would support Biran’s argument in the passage regarding the Mongols and the “integration of the old world.” b) Explain how ONE piece of evidence would challenge Biran’s argument regarding the Mongols and “the first chapter of a new era.” c) Explain how ONE intercultural transfer or exchange resulted from the Mongol conquests.

topic.text: 2.2: The Mongol Empire and the Making of the Modern World

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
